author: HuskyDynamics
title: Good, reasonably priced set
review: This set was pretty cool to build, and there are a few neat things that don't show up on the box (the inside of the mine, for example, which is actually reasonably detailed).  My only complaint is the main build: the grinder/smasher vehicle.  It is a good size and has pretty cool stickers, but it's a little bit hard to play with.  The red block on the back that LEGO calls a "crusher" can't really do much other than keep the vehicle from falling over forward.  Otherwise, this is a good, solid set.  The minecart rails work much better than I'd expected, and the bear can steal them (the minecarts, not the rails)!
